Megan Chen's Blog

Bonding Over Dvorak

February 3, 2015

I found a very nice The Best of Dvorak video last night while I was studying. I like the video because it contains a lot of pieces that I’ve played in high school. I sent it to my brother, who responded by sending me Dvořák’s Scherzo Capriccioso, Op. 66. Not surprisingly, I loved the Scherzo. I’m pleased that my brother and I bonded over Dvořák.
